Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
A maelstrom often means a state of violent turmoil or sporadic movement.
The Soul Beacon siphons and redistributes Essence from hostile troops to friendly troops within the area.
灵魂信标能够汲取范围内的敌方部队精华并将其重新分配给友方部队。
“Heritor” is a the new secret tech introduced in Planetfall’s first expansion. “Essence” refers to an type of life force/energy that is repeatedly mentioned within the Heritor secret technology.

[br/][br/]While within this colony domain: Every {turns}[turn/] combat turns: [bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityred]enemy[/abilityred] unit has a {strength}[strengthentropy/] strength chance to suffer [abilityred]Energy Drained[/abilityred] for {drainedturns} [turn/].[/bullet] [bullet]In addition, each [abilityblue]friendly[/abilityblue] unit gains an [abilityblue]Essence Charge[/abilityblue].[/bullet]

[br/][br/]处于该殖民地领域内时：每 {turns}[turn/]个战斗回合：[bulletList][bullet]每个[abilityred]敌方[/abilityred]单位有 {strength}[strengthentropy/] 力量几率获得遭受[abilityred]能量枯萎[/abilityred]，持续 {drainedturns}[turn/]。[/bullet] [bullet]此外，所有[abilityblue]友方[/abilityblue]单位获得一个[abilityblue]精华充能[/abilityblue]。[/bullet]
Out of combat means within the world map. And strategic turn also means a turn within the world map. Combat turn refers to a turn within tactical combat.
The Cluster Mine Launcher harrasses all enemy troops when engaged by firing mines near them.
地雷群发射器能够在交战时向敌方部队发射地雷来扰乱敌人。

While within the colony domain: Every {turns}[turn/] combat turn: [bulletList][bullet]{mineamount} mines will be placed at random locations in the map.[/bullet] [bullet][abilityred]Enemy[/abilityred] non-Flying, non-Floating units passing over or starting their turn on a mine get a {strength}[strengthphysical/] strength chance to suffer {minedamage}[damagekinetic/] damage.[/bullet][bullet][abilityblue]Friendly[/abilityblue] units are not affected by the mines.[/bullet]

处于殖民地领域内时：每 {turns}[turn/] 个战斗回合：[bulletList][bullet]{mineamount} 个地雷会被布置在地图上的随机位置。[/bullet] [bullet]经过地雷或在有地雷的单元格上开始回合的[abilityred]敌方[/abilityred]非飞行和非悬浮单位有 {strength}[strengthphysical/] 力量几率受到 {minedamage}[damagekinetic/] 伤害。[/bullet][bullet][abilityblue]友方[/abilityblue]单位不受地雷影响[/bullet]。
Out of combat means within the world map. And strategic turn also means a turn within the world map. Combat turn refers to a turn within tactical combat.
A killzone is an area of a military engagement with a high concentration of fatalities, often caused by the deployment of heavy weapons within that area.
The Firestorm Missile Silo designates a killzone and will automatically lock onto enemy units within the area when engaged.
火焰风暴导弹在交战时将会指定一片攻击区域，自动锁定范围内的敌方单位。

While within the colony domain: Every {turns}[turn/] turns: [bulletList][bullet]A random enemy unit gains [abilityred]Firestorm Missile Lock.[/abilityred][/bullet][bulletList] [bullet] After another turn, said unit will be struck by a Firestorm Missile.[/bullet] [bullet]Firestorm Missile deals {damagecenter}[damagethermal/] damage with [abilityred]Massive Impact[abilityred/] on the center target hex.[/bullet] [bullet]It also deals {damage2}[damagethermal/] with [abilityred]High Impact[/abilityred] within a 2 hex radius.[/bullet][bullet]Additionally, it will leave fire hazards on all affected hexes.[/bullet]

处于殖民地领域内时：每 {turns}[turn/] 个回合：[bulletList][bullet]一个随机敌方单位将获得[abilityred]火焰风暴导弹锁定[/abilityred]。[/bullet][bulletList][bullet]该敌方单位在下一回合将被火焰风暴导弹击中。[/bullet][bullet]火焰风暴导弹对中心目标单元格造成 {damagecenter}[damagethermal/] 伤害并附带[abilityred]强力冲击[abilityred/]。[/bullet][bullet]此外，导弹还会对 2 个单元格范围造成 {damage2}[damagethermal/] 伤害并附带[abilityred]高度冲击[/abilityred]。[/bullet][bullet]所有受到影响的单元格上还将残留火焰灾害。[/bullet]
Out of combat means within the world map. And strategic turn also means a turn within the world map. Combat turn refers to a turn within tactical combat.
Enemy units passing over or ending their turn on this hex have a {strength}[strengthphysical/] to suffer {damage}[damagephysical/]
经过或在该单元格结束回合的敌方单位有 {strength}[strengthphysical/] 几率受到 {damage}[damagephysical/] 伤害

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
